meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #141.

td.p: Debbi Holzinger, a naval lieutenant from San Diego, California
Lonny Gulden, a sales manager from Eden Prairie, Minnesota
Steve Rogitz, a letter carrier from Gardena, California (whose 1-day cash winnings total $11,999)

tr.td: EASY MATH
FOOD FACTS
QUOTE, UNQUOTE
EGYPT
CRIME & PUNISHMENT
"BROWNS"

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'The answer to 6<sup>5</sup> divided by <sup>4</sup>/<sub>7</sub> x 0')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: The answer to 65 divided by 4/7 x 0

it grows to a cat

LonnyDebbi
')

DebbiWhat is General Mills?
$2,500
SteveWhat is General Mills?
$4,000
General Mills')
